Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is immediately followed by 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR' compared to cases where it is followed by 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurring in variants that eventually lead to a rejection by any actor (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER', 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR', etc.)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'

Name: Percentage of all process instances containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that do not experience any rejection downstream
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Number of times 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' appears in variants that include at least one occurrence of 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' executions that are part of variants with more than one submission cycle (i.e., involving re-submission after rejection)
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' relative to the total number of approval activities ('Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER', 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration APPROVED by BUDGET OWNER'

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' and containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that ultimately result in 'Payment Handled'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Payment Handled'

Name: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' events that occur before any 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' in the same case
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration REJECTED by PRE_APPROVER' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' is directly followed by a rejection activity (e.g., 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR' or 'Declaration REJECTED by BUDGET OWNER')
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration REJECTED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in variants that skip the pre-approver role entirely, compared to those that include 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases where 'Declaration APPROVED by PRE_APPROVER' does not happen

Name: Percentage of all 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' occurrences that are not followed by any further approval step before final supervisor approval
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Declaration FINAL_APPROVED by SUPERVISOR'

Name: Number of variants where 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' appears more than once due to rejections and resubmissions
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities for cases where activity 'Declaration SUBMITTED by EMPLOYEE' occurs

Name: Percentage of total activity executions in the log accounted for by 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION'
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' in cases with declaration amounts above 100 euros
Metric: Number of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' activities > 100 where ma is the last value of case:Amount

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' that proceed directly to 'Request Payment' without intermediate approvals or rejections
Metric: Percentage of 'Declaration APPROVED by ADMINISTRATION' out of all 'Request Payment'
